duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement strategies to grow trusted-advisor relationships and facilitate an exceptional client experience.
Serve as the hub of the account team for key client accounts, working with Client Leads to support strategic execution.
Lead and track multiple, complex sets of client relationship activities including RFPs, new business opportunities, client events, and custom client marketing efforts.
Plan and lead recurring internal team meetings, managing agenda preparation and tracking follow-up items.
Develop and provide regular client relationship reporting focused on key metrics, strategic actions, and impact.
Activate, organize, and oversee the coordination of supporting Business Services teams to maximize the firm’s resources to the benefit of the client and firm.
Work with finance and pricing teams to understand client requirements, account financial metrics, and pricing arrangements.
Facilitate process and discussions on rate negotiations and financial analyses in collaboration with Client and Matter Leads, LPM, and Pricing teams.
Review, analyze, understand, and report key client account data including financial, diversity, and other metrics.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent required. Master’s degree (MBA, MA, MS JD, or other relevant graduate degree) preferred.
